pageContext.claim: “You call up the head of U.S. Steel, chief executive officer, what’s his name? Great guy. He’s – he’s opening up six or seven plants, he’s going to open up others, he’s spending billions of dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of seven facilities. (In the past Trump has claimed six.) The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
